page.title: 08TRANSPORT
page.content: Apart from main roads,there are many minor roas & bridleways.Parts of Warmwell & Broadmayne have no pavements especially dangerous as traffic often exceeds the 30mph speed limit.The nearest railway station is Dorchester:4 miles.Services connect to London & Bristol.The decline in rural bus servies is exemplified by their infrequency.Warmwell only has a school bus.The last bus on Saturdays reaches Broadmayne at 21.45hrs.No buses run on Sundays.More buses run on Wednesdays & Saturdays.There are some workers' buses & some private contractors e.g. Dorset Queen Coaches.Most households own cars,many more than one,often in consequence of living in a rural area. People need cars for employment, recreation,taking children to school & for a varied social life.
